item.title: Ashes of May
item.description: Ashes of May by Ritual Dust A 7-min meditative drone piece that feels like taking a stroll through a field early in the morning, just in time to see the first sun rays peek at the horizon, torch in hand, on your way to light a Bealtaine bonfire. Originally recorded for “This Trembling Place”, a drone compilation put together by fallen lo-
